homePage.bannerContent: Explore Tattoo Styles, Artist Business Tips, Journal Updates, Financing Options, and Seamless Booking
homePage.ArtistSliderContent: Discover the perfect tattoo artist for every project, tailored to your unique vision.
homePage.financeInk: Our app offers credit checks, finance options, and flexible payment plans, ensuring everyone can afford their dream tattoo.
homePage.TattooDictionaryContent: Dive into the language of tattoos. From classic styles to the latest trends, our Tattoo Dictionary ensures you understand the art before choosing your ink.
homePage.journalContent: Stay in the know with our Tattoo Journal. Get updates on the latest trends, legally required health and safety guidelines, and insider tips from the tattoo industry.
homePage.StylesContent: Explore a world of creativity. From fine line details to bold black ink, our app showcases diverse tattoo styles, helping you find the perfect match for your vision.
homePage.ArtistContent: Empower your tattoo artist journey. Our app provides insights into running a successful tattoo studio, crafting a business plan, and mastering the art of social media.
homePage.We curate a selection: We curate a selection of top-tier tattoo artists, ensuring a standard of excellence in both skill and professionalism.
homePage.Navigate inckd effortlessly: Navigate inckd effortlessly. Our app is designed with you in mind, providing a seamless experience from exploration to booking.
homePage.Rest easy knowing: Rest easy knowing that your payments are secure. inckd employs encryption technology for safe and worry-free transactions.
homePage.FullWidthCarouselContent: Stay in the know with our Tattoo Journal. Get updates on the latest trends, legally required health and safety guidelines, and insider tips from the tattoo industry.
homePage.TattooIdeaDesc: Easily submit your tattoo idea once and connect with multiple suited artists. Lean back and receive varied proposals for free, finding your ideal artist match effortlessly.
homePage.worldOfInk: Explore the World of Ink: Discover Tattoos in Every Style, From Timeless to Trendsetting

styleGuidePage.bannerContent: Explore unique tattoo styles in our app! find your perfect ink. Dive into endless options today.
styleGuidePage.LetteringTattooContent: Elevate your self-expression with captivating lettering tattoos. Find skilled artists on our Tattoo Booking App for personalized and impactful ink that tells your unique story. Explore now!
styleGuidePage.FinelineTattooContent: Experience the elegance of fineline tattoos, where intricate details and delicate designs converge. Our Tattoo Booking App connects you with skilled artists for timeless, subtly detailed self-expression. Explore today!
styleGuidePage.RealisticTattooContent: Experience the elegance of realistic tattoos, where intricate details and delicate designs converge. Our Tattoo Booking App connects you with skilled artists for timeless, subtly detailed self-expression. Explore today!
styleGuidePage.TraditionalTattooContent: Experience the elegance of fineline tattoos, where intricate details and delicate designs converge. Our Tattoo Booking App connects you with skilled artists for timeless, subtly detailed self-expression. Explore today!,

klarnaPage.bannerContent: Exciting news: We've teamed up with Klarna to offer you the flexibility of installment payments for tattoos by the tattoo artist of your choice. Your dream tattoo is now more accessible than ever!
klarnaPage.MainTitle2: You choose how you want to pay!
klarnaPage.Text1: Tattoo now and pay up to 30 days later. No interest. No fees, when you pay on time.
klarnaPage.Text2: Spread the cost of your purchase into 3 interest-free instalments. The first payment is made at point of the tattoo appointment day, with remaining instalments scheduled automatically every 30 days.
klarnaPage.Text3: Spread the cost of your purchase into 4 interest-free instalments. The first payment is made at point of the tattoo appointment day, with remaining instalments scheduled automatically every 2 weeks.
klarnaPage.Text4: This Financing options are credit plans with repayment terms ranging up to 36 months. The first payment is made at point of the tattoo appointment day, with remaining instalments scheduled automatically every 30 days.
klarnaPage.content_sub: Discover the perfect tattoo artist for every project, tailored to your unique vision.
klarnaPage.carosuelTitle-Sub: tattoo artist to finance your tattoo
klarnaPage.optionTitle-1: Get an extra 30 days to pay.
klarnaPage.optionContent-1: Take your time deciding on your perfect tattoo. We offer an extra 30 days to complete your payment, totally interest-free.
klarnaPage.optionContent-2: Experience a modern way to commit to your next tattoo with the option to pay in 3 equal, interest-free instalments.
klarnaPage.optionContent-3: Spread the cost of your purchase into 4 interest-free instalments. The first payment is made at point of the tattoo appointment day, with remaining instalments scheduled automatically every 2 weeks.
klarnaPage.optionTitle-4: Up to 36 months to pay for your tattoo.
klarnaPage.optionContent-4: This Financing options are credit plans with repayment terms ranging up to 36 months. The first payment is made at point of the tattoo appointment day, with remaining instalments scheduled automatically every 30 days.
klarnaPage.terms: Klarna's Pay in 3 and Pay in 30 days are unregulated credit agreements. Borrowing more than you can afford or paying late may negatively impact your financial status and ability to obtain credit. 18+, UK residents only. Subject to status.Ts&Cs and late fees apply.
klarnaPage.findArtists: Need help to find the right tattoo artist?
klarnaPage.workingStepContent-1: Download our user-friendly app for free and dive into the vibrant world of tattoos, packed with features to explore!
klarnaPage.workingStepContent-2: Explore thousands of tattoo artists from around the globe and choose the one that perfectly matches your style and vision.
klarnaPage.workingStepContent-3: Accept an offer from your chosen artist within the inckd app and embark on the journey to bring your tattoo idea to life.
klarnaPage.workingStepContent-4: Select Klarna at checkout. This allows you to choose a payment plan that suits your financial comfort
klarnaPage.workingStepContent-5: Now that the details are settled, look forward to an exciting session with your chosen artist. It’s time to relax, have fun, and watch your tattoo come to life
klarnaPage.workingStepContent-6: Congratulations on Your New Tattoo! Now, seamlessly manage payments over time with your chosen plan. Enjoy the art without any immediate financial strain
klarnaPage.klarnaTerms: Klarna's Pay in 3 and Pay in 30 days are unregulated credit agreements. Borrowing more than you can afford or paying late may negatively impact your financial status and ability to obtain credit. 18+, UK residents only. Subject to status.

forArtistPage.bannerContent: Grow your tattoo business by fulfilling your customers' tattoo vision and offering them flexible payment options.
forArtistPage.set-up-and-manage: Easy to set up and manage
forArtistPage.content2: inckd is your ally in creating a thriving, client-focused tattoo business. Display your portfolio proudly to attract clients who appreciate your unique style. Expand your customer base effortlessly through seamless communication and hassle-free payment management, all within one user-friendly platform.
forArtistPage.content3: Engage in real-time chats to understand your clients preferences firsthand. Efficiently handle appointments and stay prepared to meet your clients needs. Discuss offers and provide progress updates with inckd, ensuring their tattoo vision becomes a reality at every stage.
forArtistPage.title4: Get inckd. customers tattoing with you now.
forArtistPage.content5: inckd. puts you in the drivers seat of your tattoo business schedule, providing a comprehensive overview of all bookings through a real-time dashboard right at your fingertips. Define your availability and make it easier for clients to schedule appointments according to their preferences.
forArtistPage.content6: Secure swift payments, monitor in real-time, and incentivize repeat business with attractive discounts. We support popular payment methods, including credit cards, and have partnered with Klarna for convenient installment plans on larger projects, ensuring financial flexibility for your clients.
forArtistPage.content7: Effortlessly expand your reach by adding and managing multiple studios on our versatile platform. Seamlessly handle split payments directly within the app, or grant studios the autonomy to manage clients and bookings. Experience unparalleled convenience in studio management, all consolidated within one user-friendly application

joinartistPage.getStarted: Get started by downloading our app from the App Store or Google Play Store.
joinartistPage.CompleteYourProfile: Complete your profile by updating your basic details, your preferred tattoo style, and uploading stunning portfolio images.
joinartistPage.easyVerificationProcess: Go through our quick and easy verification process to receive the inckd team's approval.

contactUsPage.title: Contact us
contactUsPage.content: Please feel free to reach out to us with any questions, comments, or inquiries. We are here to assist you and provide the information you need. Your feedback is important to us, and we look forward to hearing from you.

faqScreen.title1: Why should I get the inckd. app?
faqScreen.content1: You can discover new artists and style that fit just what you are looking for. Finding the right concept, style, and artist close to you is possible thanks to our search features. We provide you with a clear and simple way to get in touch, send your request, and pay safely for your tattoo all in one place.
faqScreen.content2: Yes! We do not believe in subscriptions or premium features. Whether for tattoo lovers or artists, the use of the app is free. When you pay for a tattoo, we take commision to cover the transaction fees.
faqScreen.title3: In which countries is inckd. active?
faqScreen.content3: inckd. is open in most European countries, and we are expanding fast!
faqScreen.content4: We want to build a platform where tattoo lovers can find the artist that really fit their needs and ideas. With more filters and a better browsing experience, you can discover amazing artists and get in touch with them easily. For artists, we are supporting them in finding new clients and with a management tool that takes the stress off bookings, so they can focus on their art!
faqScreen.title5: Tell me more about the app
faqScreen.content5: inckd. connects artists and tattoo lovers in a unique tattoo app where people can get inspired and get a new tattoo with only a few clicks. Focusing straight on tattoos, inckd. wants to help tattoo lovers to find the right artist for their style and vision.
faqScreen.title6: Which payment method are accepted on the app?
faqScreen.content6: You can pay with the most diffused payment methods: we accept credit cards and we have partnered with Klarna to offer you safe payments and the possibility to pay in installments for your big pieces!
faqScreen.title7: What are the conditions for being part of inckd. as an artist? And what's in for me?
faqScreen.content7: inckd. verifies each artist which wants to be live on the platform as the tattoo lovers wants to find great and professional artist in Europe. With inckd. your work is reaching new customers from the whole of Europe! We provide you with a simplified booking process that reduces the stress of the administration for you and lets you focus on your art!
faqScreen.title8: Can I be on inckd. but get paid outside of the app?
faqScreen.content8: Once a booking has been confirmed, we collect the payment deposit and we transfer it in your bank account with the final customer payment. We advice not to avoid completing payment in the app.
faqScreen.title9: When do I get paid the deposit?
faqScreen.content9: Once the tattoo session is completed, you will get the full payment of the total amount of the tattoo in your bank account.
faqScreen.title10: There are many apps like this, what makes this one different?
faqScreen.content10: Instagram, Messenger, WhatsApp, Email... You do not have to stress about multiple apps. All clients can reach you via inckd. Just one place and peace of mind.
faqScreen.title11: How can I reach inckd. Support?
faqScreen.content11: You can write us via the contact form on the webpage and on Instagram: inckd_support
faqScreen.title12: Will I retain ownership of my images and designs?
faqScreen.content12: Of course, your art will always remain yours. What you post on inckd. might be featured in promotional material for the app, which will show you as the artist.
faqScreen.title13: Do I have to create a profile to use inckd.?
faqScreen.content13: You can browse designs and artists freely, but to save your favourites or book a session, you will need to create a profile. This allows the artist to verify who you are and the inckd. team to check in if you need any support.
faqScreen.title14: Are the artists professional and do they work in a safe studio?
faqScreen.content14: Yes, each tattoo artist and studio is verified by inckd.
faqScreen.title15: How can I get in touch with an artist?
faqScreen.content15: Go on the artist page, and on the top right you will see the "Start chat" button. Some artists might require you to submit a request form before messaging.
faqScreen.title16: How can I reach the inckd. team for help?
faqScreen.content16: You can write us via the contact form on the webpage and on Instagram: inckd.support
